The rabbit, wearing pink overalls and yellow gloves, is playing a video game. The rabbit, facing away from the viewer, is sitting on an orange block. Suddenly, the rabbit turns its head, eyes wide open and mouth agape, then runs to a position above the clown, one hand formed into a fist, ready to press a red button below.
